title: Settings: Checking settings default
custom_preconds: Given this is the first time you are on the settings page
custom_steps: When you look at the settings page
custom_expected:
Then the 'Favorite Team' should be set to 'None'
And 'Low Memory Settings' should be set to 'Keep Playing'
And 'Audio Feed' Should be set to 'Shoutcast'
And 'Scoreboard Refresh Rate' should be set to 15 seconds
And the 'Widget Refresh Rate' should be set to 15 seconds
And 'MLB.com Account' should read 'Enter credentials'

title: Settings: Changing the 'Low Memory' setting
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the settings section
And you have not previously changed the low memory setting before
custom_steps:
When you tap on the low memory settings tab
And tap on 'Stop Audio'
And begin to run as many apps in the background as you can
And go back into at bat and start an audio feed
custom_expected: Then eventually when the memory runs low the audio will stop

title: Settings: Changing the 'Scoreboard Refresh Rate' setting
custom_preconds:
Given that you are on the settings section
And the 'Scoreboard Refresh Rate' has not been previously changed
custom_steps:
When you tap on the 'Scoreboard Refresh Rate' from the settings section
And select '30 Seconds'
custom_expected:
Then the 'Scoreboard Refresh Rate' pop up will disappear
And when you go back to the scoreboard the games will begin to refresh at 30 second rate

**REPEAT for 1 minute rate also**

title: Settings: Logging in with your MLB.com account
custom_preconds:
Given that you have a valid MLB.com account
And you are on the settings section
custom_steps:
When you tap the 'MLB.com Account' tab
And enter in the email address of the MLB.com account
And enter in the password
custom_expected:
Then you should be logged in and the log in pop will disappear
And your email will appear on the settings page in the MLB.com account tap

title: Settings: Logging into with an invalid email
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the settings page
And you are using an email address that is not associated with a MLB.com account
custom_steps:
When you tap on the 'MLB.com Account' tab
And enter in a the invalid email and password
custom_expected:
Then you will see a notification saying 'Invalid Email/Password'
And after you tap 'OK' to dismiss the notification on the settings page it will say 'Invalid Email/Password' in the 'MLB.com Account' tab

title: Settings: Resetting password
custom_preconds:
Given you are on the settings section
And you have a valid email address associated with a MLB.com account
custom_steps:
When you tap on the 'MLB.com Account' tab
And tap on the 'Forget Password' link
And enter in your email address
custom_expected:
Then in the reset password popup you will see in red 'New Password Sent!'
And you will be sent a new password to the email address you entered
And you will use that new password and that email address to successfully log in

title: More: Checking Proper Tabs Exist
custom_preconds: Given you are on the More section
custom_steps: When we look at the tabs on the left
custom_expected:
Then we will see a tab labeled 'Feedback'
And we will see a tab labeled 'FAQ (Blackout Restrictions)'
And we will see a tab labeled 'MLB Shop'
And we will see a tab labeled 'About MLB.com'
And we will see a tab labeled 'Terms and Conditions'

title: More: Tapping on the Feedback Tab loads it properly and is accurate
custom_preconds: Given we have navigated to the 'More' section
custom_steps: When we tap on the 'Feedback' tab
custom_expected:
Then the 'Feedback' tab will load
And the 'Feedback' tab will appear formatted correctly
And the 'Feedback' tab will appear correct grammar wise

title: More: Tapping on the FAQ (Blackout Restrictions) loads it properly and is accurate
custom_preconds: Given we have navigated to the 'More' section
custom_steps: When we tap on the 'FAQ (Blackout Restrictions)' tab
custom_expected:
Then the 'FAQ (Blackout Restrictions)' tab will load successfully
And the 'FAQ (Blackout Restrictions)' tab will be formatted correctly
And the 'FAQ (Blackout Restrictions)' tab will have proper grammar

title: More: Tapping on the MLB Shop tab loads it properly and is accurate
custom_preconds: Given we have navigated to the 'More' section
custom_steps: When we tap on the 'MLB Shop' tab
custom_expected:
Then the 'MLB Shop' website properly loads up
And the 'MLB Shop' website is formatted correctly

title: More: Tapping on the About MLB.com tab loads it properly and is accurate
custom_preconds: Given we have navigated to the 'More' section
custom_steps: When we tap on the "About MLB.com" tab
custom_expected:
Then the "About MLB.com" loads correctly
And the "About MLB.com" area is formatted correctly

title: More: Tapping on the Terms and Conditions tab loads it properly and is accurate
custom_preconds: Given we have navigated to the 'More' section
custom_steps: When the user taps on the 'Terms and Conditions' tab
custom_expected:
Then the 'Terms and Conditions' properly loads
And the 'Terms and Conditions' are formatted correctly
And the 'Terms and Conditions' have correct spelling and grammar
